sunnahs.text: Recite Ayah-tul-Kursi after every prayer: It was narrated from Anas (R.A.): "The Prophet (S.A.W) prohibited that a man should drink while standing." (Qatadah said) So it was said: "And eating?" He (Anas) said: "That is worse."

The Messenger of Allah, S.A.W, said, "Whoever recites the verse of the Throne (ayat al-kursi) after every prescribed prayer, there will be nothing standing between him and his entering Paradise except death."
When you want to go to bed to sleep, make wudu as you would for the prayer, then lie on your right side

The Messenger of Allah, S.A.W, said, "Whoever recites the verse of the Throne (ayat al-kursi) after every prescribed prayer, there will be nothing standing between him and his entering Paradise except death."
